procedural_fairness: visa officer did not provide opportunity to address concerns
no obligation to allow response as no extrinsic evidence was used
applicable_regulations: Immigration Act - foreign national must prove intent to leave Canada
decision_reasoning: no violation of procedural fairness principles
acknowledged compassionate circumstances but found no reviewable error
application_details: temporary resident visa application for humanitarian reasons denied due to concerns about return intent
cause_of_action: concerns about remaining in Canada for economic opportunities
procedure_followed: judicial review analyzed upholding of procedural fairness and errors in visa denial process
